Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.components

Class GamePhaseCommandHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.components.GamePhaseCommandHandler
public class GamePhaseCommandHandler
extends java.lang.Object
This class manages every possible interaction with user. Every time a user write a command go through this class and different approaches are applied based on GAME_PHASE.

  • Constructor Details

    • GamePhaseCommandHandler

      public GamePhaseCommandHandler​(Cli cli)

  • Method Details

    • gameLoop

      public void gameLoop()
      This method manages every possible interaction with the client. All the commands received by the client are parsed in this method grouped by game phases.

    • computeCommand

      private boolean computeCommand​(java.lang.String[] splitCommand)
      This private method checks if a command received through console is a valid command or not.
      Parameters:
      splitCommand - is an array of strings which contains, separately, all the different words entered in the console.
      Returns:
      false if the command contains computed words, even if these are not valid in the game; true otherwise.

    • printBoard

      public void printBoard​(java.lang.String board)
      This method invokes another method which contains an algorithm to print the board game Cli version.
      Parameters:
      board - indicates the board, JSON-format which is used in the relative match. It contains references to each cell
